name: Country Master
description:
!Maximize the game screen for a complete playing experience!

You know the trivia game that you play in a pub on a Friday night? Yeah this game is designed to be kinda like that, except what you will be answering is the name of the map/flag's country. Shout out to the geo-lovers!

This is a world map and flags guessing game.

The game is meant to be fully controlled by the host and NOT the players.

To start, press the blue button with an arrow on top.

For more information, click the "i" icon once the game has started.
